description: pdfAssistant is a powerful AI chatbot, available 24/7 to perform all of your PDF processing tasks.
title: pdfAssistant.ai | Your Personal PDF Assistant
introduction: pdfAssistant is a powerful AI chatbot, available 24/7 to perform all of your PDF processing tasks. Convert, watermark, merge, and more â€” whatever you need, all you have to do is ask.
targetPeople: Anyone who needs to process digital documents, including PDFs, using simple, natural language commands.

faqs.question: What is pdfAssistant?
faqs.answer: pdfAssistant is a revolutionary service that lets you generate and process digital documents, including PDFs and many other file formats, using simple, natural language commands.

faqs.question: How do I use pdfAssistant?
faqs.answer: Just chat with our friendly AI assistant to create, update, and optimize your documents or perform a broad range of processing tasks, like merging documents, compressing files, converting between file formats, and more.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can sign up with just your email and receive free starter credits to explore all the features.
